Description: Verify admin can view complete list of orders
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to orders page
2. Verify orders displayed
3. Check user names populated
Expected Result: All orders displayed with user names

Description: Verify admin can view single order details
Test Steps:
1. Click on order
2. Verify all order details shown
3. Check items, shipping, payment info

Description: Verify admin can view statistics dashboard
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Verify statistics displayed
3. Check charts rendered
Expected Result: Dashboard shows correct statistics and charts

Test Case Name: Admin update order status to Processing
Description: Verify admin can change status to Processing
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Order with Pending status
Test Steps:
1. Open order details
2. Change status to Processing
3. Save changes
4. Verify update
Expected Result:
Status updated successfully
Message: "Order Status Updated"

Test Case Name: Admin update order status to Shipping
Description: Verify admin can change status to Shipping
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Order with Processing status
Test Steps:
1. Open order details
2. Change status to Shipping
3. Save changes
4. Verify update

Description: Verify admin can mark order as delivered
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Order with Shipping status
Test Steps:
1. Open order details
2. Change status to Delivered
3. Verify isDelivered flag set
4. Verify deliveredAt timestamp
Expected Result:
Status: Delivered
isDelivered: true
deliveredAt set

Test Case Name: Admin mark COD order as Delivered
Description: Verify COD order marked as paid when delivered
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
COD order with Shipping status
Test Steps:
1. Open COD order
2. Change status to Delivered
3. Verify isPaid set to true
4. Verify paidAt timestamp
5. Verify cart clearedt
Expected Result:
Status: Delivered
isPaid: true
paidAt set
Cart deleted

Description: Verify admin can cancel order
Test Steps:
1. Open order details
2. Change status to Cancelled
3. Save changes
4. Verify cancellation

Description: Verify error handling for invalid order ID | Admin logged in
Test Steps:
1. Request order with invalid ID
2. Verify error response

Test Case Name: pdate order status with invalid value
Description: Verify validation for invalid status
Test Steps:
1. Attempt to update with invalid status
2. Verify error response

Description: Verify non-admin cannot access admin orders
Test Steps:
1. Attempt to access /api/orders
2. Verify access denied

Description: Verify unauthenticated user cannot access
Test Steps:
1. Attempt to access /api/orders without token
2. Verify access denied

Description: Verify admin can filter orders by status
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Orders with different statuses
Test Steps:
1. Apply status filter
2. Verify filtered results
3. Check only matching orders shown

Description: Verify admin can filter orders by user
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Orders from different users
Test Steps:
1. Apply user filter
2. Verify filtered results
3. Check only user's orders shown

Description: Verify admin can filter by date
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Orders from different dates
Test Steps:
1. Select date range
2. Apply filter
3. Verify results within range
Expected Result: Only orders in date range shown

Description: Verify admin can sort by date
Test Steps:
1. Click sort by date
2. Verify ascending order
3. Click again for descending

Description: Verify admin can sort by price
Test Steps:
1. Click sort by total price
2. Verify order by price
3. Toggle sort direction

Description: Verify admin can sort by status
Test Steps:
1. Click sort by status
2. Verify alphabetical order
3. Toggle sort direction

Description: Verify correct total orders count
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Orders in database
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Check numOrders value
3. Verify against database

Description: Verify correct total sales calculation
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Orders in database
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Check totalSales value
3. Verify sum of all order totals

Description: Verify correct users count
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Users in database
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Check numUsers value
3. Verify against database

Description: Verify daily orders aggregation
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Orders from multiple days
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Check dailyOrders data
3. Verify grouping by date
Expected Result: Daily orders correctly grouped and sorted

Description: Verify daily sales aggregation
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Orders from multiple days
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Check daily sales data
3. Verify sum by date

Description: Verify category distribution
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Products in categories
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to dashboard
2. Check productCategories data
3. Verify count by category

Description: Verify order items display correctly
Preconditions:
Admin logged in
Order with items
Test Steps:
1. View order details
2. Check all items displayed
3. Verify item details (name, price, quantity, image)
Expected Result: All items shown with complete details

Description: Verify shipping address shown correctly
Test Steps:
1. View order details
2. Check shipping address section
3. Verify all fields (fullName, address, city, postalCode, country)

Description: Verify payment method shown
Test Steps:
1. View order details
2. Check payment method
3. Verify payment result if paid

Description: Verify timestamps displayed correctly
Test Steps:
1. View order details
2. Check createdAt timestamp
3. Check updatedAt timestamp
4. Check paidAt if paid
5. Check deliveredAt if delivered

Description: Verify cart deletion after payment
Test Steps:
1. User pays order via PayPal
2. Admin marks as paid
3. Verify cart deleted for user

Description: Verify cart deletion after COD delivery
Test Steps:
1. Admin marks COD order as Delivered
2. Verify cart deleted for user
